name: Stronger
description: WE ARE STRONGER is a faith-based movie exploring a veteran's battle with PTSD. As he struggles to recover from his injuries, reclaim his marriage, and fit back into the civilian world, he discovers he can't do it alone.

review.author: carla-910-24566
review.heading: Revolutionary Movie of Radical Hope, Forgiveness, and Restoration!
review.reviewBody: One of the most powerful, inspirational, and authentic films I've ever seen! This movie is a life-changer for everyone. I walked away with a greater understanding of the effects PTSD has on not only veterans but also first responders and other trauma survivors. I highly recommend watching WE ARE STRONGER to everyone!

keywords: ptsd post traumatic stress disorder,veteran,christian film,christianity,trauma
